sn11.14:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn11.14:2.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, annataro puriso imasmimyeva rajagahe manussadaliddo ahosi manussakapano manussavarako.
sn11.14:2.2: So tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddham samadiyi, silam samadiyi, sutam samadiyi, cagam samadiyi, pannam samadiyi.
sn11.14:2.3: So tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddham samadiyitva silam samadiyitva sutam samadiyitva cagam samadiyitva pannam samadiyitva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajji devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.
sn11.14:2.4: So anne deve atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca.
sn11.14:2.5: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa ujjhayanti khiyyanti vipacenti:
sn11.14:2.7: Ayanhi devaputto pubbe manussabhuto samano manussadaliddo ahosi manussakapano manussavarako;
sn11.14:2.8: so kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanno devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.
sn11.14:2.9: So anne deve atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca’ti.
sn11.14:3.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo deve tavatimse amantesi:
sn11.14:3.2: ‘ma kho tumhe, marisa, etassa devaputtassa ujjhayittha.
sn11.14:3.3: Eso kho, marisa, devaputto pubbe manussabhuto samano tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddham samadiyi, silam samadiyi, sutam samadiyi, cagam samadiyi, pannam samadiyi.
sn11.14:3.4: So tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddham samadiyitva silam samadiyitva sutam samadiyitva cagam samadiyitva pannam samadiyitva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanno devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.
sn11.14:3.5: So anne deve atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca’ti.
sn11.14:3.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo deve tavatimse anunayamano tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
